roleset.name: promise
roleset.note: GUARANTEE-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. No comparison. Member of Vncls conjecture-29.5-1, ensure-99, future_having-13.3, promise-37.13. (from guarantee.01-v)
GUARANTEE-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls conjecture-29.5-1, ensure-99, future_having-13.3, promise-37.13. (from guarantee.01-n)

example.name: guaranteed SBAR
example.text: Maxicare also will guarantee that the banks will realize at least $7 million on certain notes pledged to them.
example.arg: that the banks will realize at least $7 million on certain notes pledged to them

example.name: guaranteed NP
example.text: Apogee said the charge stems from a building supply contract in which the company guaranteed a contractor's performance.

example.name: passivized benefactive
example.text: According to the Illinois attorney general's suit, Watson& Hughey sent mailings indicating that [recipients]-1 were [*-1] guaranteed cash prizes.

example.name: guaranteed VP
example.text: However a Qintex Australia spokesman said his firm had never ``promised or guaranteed'' to make the payment.

example.name: autogen1 (when 'it' is the agent, not the thing being circulated)
autogen2-- with beneficiary
example.text: loan guarantees for the Overseas Private Investment Corp.
example.arg: for the Overseas Private Investment Corp.

example.name: topical arg1
example.text: guarantees about how a Supreme Court justice will rule
example.arg: about how a Supreme Court justice will rule
